name: WordPress Search Exclude
tagline: Hide any page or post from search results
body:
Search Exclude â€“ WordPress plugin that lets you hide any page, post or whatever from the search results. Just check off the corresponding checkbox on post/page edit page.

![Editing post](https://ps.w.org/search-exclude/assets/screenshot-1.png?rev=87537)

You can also view the list of all the items that are excluded from search on the plugin settings page.

![List of all excluded](https://ps.w.org/search-exclude/assets/screenshot-2.png?rev=877537)


### Support or Contact
For any questions contact [author](http://pronskiy.com) or create a thread on [plugin support forum](http://wordpress.org/support/plugin/search-exclude).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
